Her and Bill's dealings with the laws have put many people in jail for nonsense. I was in boot camp for the military, when she voted to enter the Iraq war. It is obvious that she is against the environment because she is pro fracking. I have watched her straight up lie, under oath, on more than one occasion. Yet somehow she is supposed to be the next president... Hell no!
